bio: I am a Master Student in LMI (Languages & International Management) at Université d'Artois.
proj_negotiation_desc: Analysis of intercultural negotiation strategies between French and Chinese companies.
proj_seminar_desc: Organization and management of an international student seminar at the university.
proj_translation_desc: Technical translation (EN > FR) for the official documentation of a local NGO.
about_intro: Passionate about languages, sports, and global openness.
about_text: Currently in Master 1 LMI, I combine my studies with strong associative and professional commitments. I love taking on challenges and working in a team, whether on a volleyball court or in project management.
timeline_asso_desc: Université d'Artois — Project management, leadership, and student life animation.
timeline_afev_desc: Social Services — Educational support and individual mentoring for children in care.
timeline_mcdo_desc: McDonald's (Part-time) — Customer reception, preparation, and teamwork in a fast-paced environment.
timeline_bac_desc: Lycée F. Darchicourt — Economics, Geopolitics, English (High Honors).
contact_intro: Interested in my profile? Feel free to contact me to discuss opportunities or just to chat!
proj_erasmus_desc: 4-week virtual collaborative project with an Irish partner. Intercultural communication and final presentation certified by UNICollaboration.
